outcome: Built for perfection, not iteration. Missed market window.
lesson: Ship fast, iterate faster. Perfect is the enemy of launched.

outcome: AI can't read subtext. Students felt unheard.
lesson: Technology should augment human connection, not replace it.

outcome: Wrong platform architecture. MongoDB for time-series was naive.
lesson: Choose the right tool for the job, not the trendy one.

outcome: Split equity before roles were clear. Partnership dissolved.
lesson: Alignment on vision and values before contracts.

outcome: 8-channel system crashed opening night. Underestimated complexity.
lesson: Test in production conditions. Murphy's Law is real.

outcome: Cut by director. Too many layers, lost the emotional core.
lesson: Precision without context is waste. Serve the story.

outcome: Market mismatch. Target audience didn't exist yet.
lesson: Rigidity breaks; adaptability bends. Timing matters.
